description: Behind The Scenes 77 minutes long ... We're doing something we've never done before here at Active Duty and giving you nearly an hour and a half of behind the scenes footage showing some of the stuff that goes on during our shoots and before and after them. This particular weekend all the boys arrived late in the evening on Thursday and I had a big cookout for them and we all ate, drank and partied pretty hard. There's so much great stuff here that'll let you see exactly how things happen around here when the camera is off. This particular night none of the boys had any idea that my plan for the weekend was to make a glory hole movie. None of them knew the porthole even existed yet and you get to see it all unfold about how they find out about it. Surprisingly there's quite a bit of sex on the behind the scenes disc as I introduce Reese and Domenic to the porthole while everyone else parties in the other room. No one knows where the three of us have disappeared to but later they'll come looking and what they find surprises and intrigues the hell out of them and a rehearsal session naturally unfolds as they all have to try the porthole. You get to see the familial aspect of Active Duty and how these guys bond so well off camera that it helps make things on camera so much hotter. Behind the scenes should be called Family Night as we invite you into our private time. After all, you're family, too!
title: The Porthole: Behind the Scenes
